resources.string: The goal of the game is to collect all the cards by suit in ascending order in four corner decks, starting with an ace. You can play five intermediate decks from the dispensing card deck. If the goal deck is empty then start play deck from any card. If deck is not empty then you can play cards in descending order regardless of the suit. Cards can be played between all decks including the corner ones according to the rules described above except for the dispensing deck.
